title: Kubernetes Multi-Cluster Setup

title: Terraform AWS Infrastructure

title: End-to-End--3-Tier-Infrastructure-Automation-using-Terraform-Ansible-Jenkins
description: End-to-end 3-tier infrastructure automation on AWS using Terraform, Ansible, and Jenkins. Terraform provisions the infrastructure, Ansible configures Web and App servers, and Jenkins orchestrates deployments via CI/CD. The project follows DevOps best practices with IaC, configuration management, and version control.
